activity_differential: people adjusting a banner using a ladder
people working together to hang a banner in the rain
description: Three people are collaboratively installing or adjusting a large vertical banner on the exterior of a building using a ladder. One person is climbing and working at the top of the ladder, another is stabilizing the ladder and managing the banner at the bottom, and a third person appears on the balcony to assist. An umbrella is briefly used, likely to shield from rain.
